name: Google Search - Visible Cached + Similar links
description:
Restores Cached and Similar links to be seen in plain view.

If no links appear, it means Google does not have any links to offer (page not cached, no 'similar' option provided).
additional_info:
restore cache cached similar bring back link visible This style isn't needed if you search with Javascript disabled, as the links are displayed when it's disabled. 2014-06-21
  • Updated to work, implemented fixes suggested by user 64120 - thanks.
2013-04-27
  • Added additional option for new Cache/Similar design.
  • Changed style title.
